trans-unit.source: An editing scope represents a collection of changes to the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref> tree that can be committed or rolled back as one atomic unit of work.
trans-unit.target: 編輯範圍，代表集合的變更<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref>可加以認可或復原工作的原子單元為樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for batching together a set of changes to multiple <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: 這適用於批次處理的一組變更至多個<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem>物件。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem>

trans-unit.source: As an example, in the messaging activities, the changes made from the raised dialogs will impact multiple property values.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在訊息活動中，從引發對話進行的變更會影響多個屬性值。

trans-unit.source: However, as all of the changes come from the raised dialog, the changes need to be considered as a batch and undone as a single unit of work.
trans-unit.target: 不過，由於所有來自於引發對話，需將變更視為批次的變更復原為單一工作單位。

trans-unit.source: For more details on usage, see the Editing Scope sample
trans-unit.target: 如需使用方式的詳細資訊，請參閱編輯範圍範例

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current editing scope instance can complete.
trans-unit.target: 判斷是否可以完成目前的編輯範圍執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the editing scope can complete; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果編輯範圍可以完成。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> that contains the changes.
Gets a Boolean that specifies whether changes have been applied to the editing scope.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值，指定變更是否已套用至編輯範圍。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if changes have been applied to the editing scope; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>..
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果尚未將變更套用至編輯範圍。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>...

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the exception is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已處理的例外狀況。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
